games.name: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: Cyberpunk 2077 is a 2020 open-world action-adventure game set in the dystopian Night City. Players control V, a mercenary navigating a society filled with cybernetic enhancements, corporate intrigue, and moral ambiguity. The game offers a visually stunning experience with a compelling narrative, exploring the intersection of technology and societal challenges in a futuristic world.
